titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Bugbrook in Northamptonshire, May 15, 1642, upon the collection for Ireland condemned in the morning, in the church, before the whole congregation for popery, and in the afternoone there, for having many lyes in it of a high nature / published by the authour in a just vindication of himselfe from that unjust scandall.
titleStmt.author: Jay, George.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Jay by Wing; "To the Reader" signed: G.I."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
